This class inject Pmog featurees into the Firefox tab.
Tab = function(panel_id,
browser,
tab_observer)
Initializes the Object
TabObserver.prototype.tab_added = function(event)
Called whenever a tab is added to the browser.
TabObserver.prototype.tab_event = function(event,
type)
Generic event responder that is called by the various listeners.
TabObserver.prototype.tab_moved = function(event)
Called whenever a tab is moved in the tab browser.
TabObserver.prototype.tab_removed = function(event)
Called whenever a tab is removed from the browser.
TabObserver.prototype.tab_selected = function(event)
Find the selected tab from the tabs array.
SQLiteConnector.prototype.table_info = function(table_name)
This function returns the pragma info for a table Generates a query like this: PRAGMA table_info(`whitelists`)
The purpose of this class is to keep track of all tabs loaded by firefox.
TabObserver = function(pmog,
force)
Initializes the Object
SpecialEffect.prototype.take_damage = function()
Display a red translucent skrim over the browser viewport just for an instant and then fade it out.
SQLiteConnector.prototype.timestamp = function(table,
attributes)
Automatically timestamp create and update operations if the table has fields named created_at/created_on or updated_at/updated_on.
Simple Ajax class for making XMLHTTP requests within Firefox extensions.
TinyAjax = function(options)
Initializes the Object
ObjectParser.prototype.to_object = function(obj)
Convert the string that is formatted like an object into an actual object.
ObjectParser.prototype.to_param = function(p,
v,
containing_property)
This function will format a string serveral differnt ways depending on the parameters provided.
ObjectParser.prototype.to_query_string = function()
This function takes an object and explodes it into a query string as a web post would expect.
Cache.prototype.to_string = function(aJSObject,
aKeysToDrop)
Converts a JavaScript object into a JSON string.
Hud.prototype.toggle_hud = function()
Toggles the hud visible or hidden depending on the hud’s current setting.
Pmog.prototype.toggle_hud_for_protocol = function(protocol)
Show or hid the pmog hud based on the protocol of the active tab.
toggleItem: function(itemName)
Will toggle a xul overlay open or closed depending on its’ current state
Pmog.prototype.track_uri = function(a,
panel_id)
Initiates the tracking request for the page loaded in the user’s browser.
SQLiteConnector.prototype.trim_last_comma = function(str)
Helper method to remove the last comma and space of a string.
Display.prototype.update = function(obj)
This method takes the contents of the obj parameter and determines if it should render to the DOM or a XUL panel.
Page.prototype.update = function(opts)
This function will update the instance of the page class with any page objects returned by the server
PassiveRecord.prototype.update = function(table,
params)
Update records matching the attributes condition param
PmogUser.prototype.update = function(obj)
This method updates the player with any properties provided by the obj parameter
Hud.prototype.update_acquaintances_menu = function(user)
This function will query the pmog server for the info for each of their buddies, which will be displayed in the IM window menu.
SQLiteConnector.prototype.update_fragment = function(table,
params)
Creates an update fragment used to update a database record
Hud.prototype.update_login_status_message = function(msg)
This function displays a text message in the login toolbox.
Hud.prototype.update_pmog_game_notice = function(msg)
This function displays a text message in the status message element.
Hud.prototype.update_pmog_player_notice = function(msg)
This function displays a text message in the status message element.
Hud.prototype.update_pmog_toolbar = function(user)
Find the xul element for the pmog toolbar and iterate over the child nodes looking for elements which match attributes of the user object.
SQLiteConnector.prototype.update_records = function(table,
params)
Updates an existing record
Hud.prototype.update_switch_users_menu = function(user,
other_logins)
This function will display the currently logged in user next to the switch users menu item in the “P” menu.
Hud.prototype.update_venture_menu = function(user)
This function will display a button to take a user on a random mission from their queue.
SQLiteConnector.prototype.use = function(db_name)
Use a specific database specified by db_name.
PmogSessionManager.prototype.use_login_manager = function(user)
This function is used by at least Firefox three, and will find all usernames and passwords for the pmog domain.
PmogSessionManager.prototype.use_password_manager = function(user)
This function is used by Firefox two, and will find all usernames and passwords for the pmog domain.
Store attributes of a user to the preference system using the name parameter as an index value.
Retrieve attributes of a user associated with the name.
Pmog.prototype.user_idle = function()
This function determines if the player has moved their mouse since a timer event elapsed.
Pmog.prototype.user_playing = function()
This function determines if the user is presently logged into PMOG.
Pmog.prototype.user_verification_params = function()
Certain remote calls to the pmog server require a valid user session and a unique authenticity token to prevent against CSRF attacks.
PassiveRecord.prototype.validate = function(table,
params)
Validates the record using validates defined in the schema for the table in question
PassiveRecord.prototype.validate_uniqueness_of = function(table,
validation,
params)
Ensure that only one record appears in a specific table using a specific column
Hud.prototype.visit_contacts = function(event)
Opens a browser tab to the friends page
Hud.prototype.visit_mailbox = function(event)
Opens a browser tab to the players mailbox
Hud.prototype.visit_pmog = function(event)
This function opens a browser window to the root pmog url.
Hud.prototype.visit_toolbar_help = function(event)
Opens a browser tab to the toolbar help page.
Tab.prototype.whenPageLoad = function(event,
listener_index)
This function is triggered when content of a tab loads.
SpecialEffect.prototype.window_quake = function(n)
Shake the browser window highly annoying
$.fn.xulScale = function(speed,
callback)
Animates the size of the XUL element to double its current size (width and height)
$.fn.xulSlideDown = function(speed,
callback)
Uses jQuery to animate the sliding of a XUL element from the browser view to being hidden.
$.fn.xulSlideUp = function(speed,
callback)
Uses jQuery to animate the sliding of a XUL element from a hidden view, to the browser view.
